Class ApplicantManageApplicationView

java.lang.Object
BTOManagementSystem.View.ApplicantManageApplicationView
public class ApplicantManageApplicationView extends Object
Provides the view layer for applicants to manage their BTO applications.

This includes displaying application statuses, handling withdrawal requests, and showing relevant confirmation or error messages.
